en-US.alert_about: Auto DND works with Autocuts to automatically turn on Do Not Disturb mode based on events in your calendars.
en-US.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of Auto DND.
en-US.error_activeTime_oob: The end time must not be before the start time.
en-US.error_dnd_string: You must supply a string for Auto DND to work properly.
en-US.menu_requireDND_description: In the title or notes field of an event
en-US.menu_requireDND_description_off: Any event will turn on Do Not Disturb
en-US.prompt_activeTime_start: Enter the time that Auto DND will begin monitoring your calendar.
en-US.prompt_activeTime_end: Enter the time that Auto DND will stop monitoring your calendar.
en-US.prompt_dndString: Enter the string that must be in the Title or Notes field to enable Do Not Disturb mode.
en-US.prompt_limitkit_install:
LimitKit is an event logging system and rate limiting tool for shortcuts.

Auto DND uses LimitKit to control how frequently it checks your calendar for DND events.

LimitKit is not installed on this iOS device. Would you like to download it?
en-US.prompt_limitkit_interval: Set the minimum amount of time Auto DND must wait before evaluating your calendar events when used with Autocuts.
en-US.prompt_earlyStart:
Enter the time in minutes before an event starts when DND will be turned on.

Trigger Auto DND via Autocuts any time during this period in order to activate DND for matching events.
